class.name: GridContainer
class.brief_description: Grid container used to arrange elements in a grid like layout
class.description: Grid container will arrange its children in a grid like structure, the grid columns are specified using the [method set_columns] method and the number of rows will be equal to the number of children in the container divided by the number of columns, for example: if the container has 5 children, and 2 columns, there will be 3 rows in the container. Notice that grid layout will preserve the columns and rows for every size of the container.

method.name: get_columns
method.description: Returns the number of columns in this container

method.name: set_columns
method.description: Sets the numbers of columns in the container, then reorder its children to accommodate the new layout

members.member: The number of columns in the [code]GridContainer[/code]. If modified, [code]GridContainer[/code] reorders its children to accommodate the new layout.
